pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, December 1, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual candle lighting ceremony in celebration of Hanukkah, and deliver brief remarks.

Closed to media
